tool_description: Compiles comprehensive growth reports including measurements, percentiles, trends, and recommendations formatted for parents or healthcare providers.

report_period_start.description: Start date for the report period

report_period_end.description: End date for the report period

growth_summary.description: Summary of growth patterns and analysis

alerts.description: Any alerts or concerns to include

report_type.description: Type of report (parent_friendly, clinical, or detailed)

include_charts.description: Whether to include visual charts in the report

measurement_count.description: Total number of measurements in the reporting period

error_messages: Invalid report period: End date must be after start date and both must be valid dates.
Invalid percentiles: Percentiles must be between 0 and 100.
Invalid report type: Must be 'parent_friendly', 'clinical', or 'detailed'.
Missing required data: Child name, ID, and growth summary are required.
Invalid measurement count: Must be a positive integer.
Invalid age: Child age must be a positive number.
usage: Provide child information, report period, percentiles, and growth summary. The tool creates a formatted report appropriate for the specified audience with optional charts and recommendations.

report_id.description: Unique identifier for the generated report

report_content.description: Formatted report content ready for display or printing

report_length_pages.description: Estimated length of the report in pages

generation_date.description: Date and time when the report was generated

included_sections.description: List of sections included in the report
